caption:
“In humility, heaven descends.”

Reflection:
The lower the heart bows, the closer grace draws. Pride builds walls; humility opens doors to divine light.

Commentary:
This reflection teaches that humility is not weakness but invitation. God meets us most deeply in our quiet surrender.
